title: Magnificent
text: Amazing to see a bridge made by nature. We took the time to walk around and absorb the beautiful scenery as well as the bridge. All of the off road sites show what a gorgeous island Aruba is with its many wonders.

title: Beautiful Sea
text: A chance to see the ocean waves crashing on the shore. Definitely nature at its finest. For an ocean lover, its paradise as you can just relax to the sound of the magnificent waves hitting the shore.

title: Paradise
text: This beach is absolutely gorgeous with white sand and green water. There are numerous water activities offered or you can just relax on a float and enjoy chilling. I can't wait to return.

title: Best Clam Chowder
text: We visit Newport frequently and our favorite meal is a delicious bowl of clam chowder from the Black Pearl. Dining is inside or outside on the wharf. A must have!

title: Gorgeous Scenery
text: A beautiful ride along the shore. You can stop at anytime and just take a walk on the beach, the rocks, or search the beach for beautiful shells. The beach is never crowded and it's very serene just to watch the waves go over the rocks.

title: Gorgeous Resort
text: The resort is beautiful. Very lush with birds, fish , pelicans , waterfalls. The beach is pristine with white sand and green water. There is so much to do. There are a number of water sport activities. Resort is very convenient to Main Street for shopping or dining.
place: Hyatt Regency Aruba Resort Spa and Casino

title: Absolutely Gorgeous Beach
text: Beach is pristine! The water is a beautiful green and very calm. You can relax on a raft for hours or just enjoy the scenery. Plenty of water sports to enjoy including parasailing, snorkeling, etc.

title: The Best Restaurant for Spareribs
text: Restaurant conveniently located on the strip. The speciality is spare ribs although you can order other dishes. Portions are a good size and price is very reasonable. Great restaurant for couples or families.

title: The Most Magnificent Tour
text: We took this UTV tour and saw 11 attractions! Our tour guides Toto and Alex were great! Very knowledgeable, fun, and helpful. The sights were breathtaking. We were so excited about this tour that we were referring people at our hotel. This is a must do while in Aruba.

title: Food Galore!
text: A meat lovers dream. They kept coming to the table with chicken, lamb,pork, and steaks. Everything was cooked to perfection. I do not eat red meat so I just eat from the salad bar. I could not believe the selection! There was such a huge selection. I have never seen such an amazing salad bar. Something for everyone.

title: A Hidden Treasure
text: A hidden treasure by the beach. Great break during a day in the sun for a drink. Best mojitos! The food is also quite good. Friendly staff!

title: Great Breakfast and Lunch
text: A surprise find on the beach for breakfast and lunch. The staff is friendly especially Dania. It was our go to place during our entire stay. Loved it! Highly recommend

title: Excellent Find
text: We actually stumbled upon this restaurant and we're happy we did. The filet mignon was a soft as butter. The grouper was delicious. The staff is very friendly.

title: A Great Place Stop Off the Merritt Parkway
text: Great restaurant whether you're in town or on the road. Located right off the exit of the Merritt Parkway. Excellent menu selection. Great for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. A favorite for townies. Fast and courteous service. Definite family style.

title: A Hamden Landmark
text: Great meeting place for Breakfast. Has been a well known restaurant for many years. Excellent service and a friendly atmosphere.

title: A town favorite
text: Great restaurant. Variety of food ranges from full course dinners to sandwiches. Sandwiches are very generous. Comfortable seating and staff extremely accomadating. Large Bar, a popular place to watch a game with friends or make new friends.

title: Great Pizza
text: Visit often for pizza. Staff extremely friendly, pizza is excellent. Very convenient. Great family dining.

title: Great Place To Stay
text: Found this hotel while visiting in November. Rooms were very clean and large. Great amenities including a full breakfast. Hotel staff was very pleasant. Enjoyable stay. Our only disappointment was all stores were closed for the winter, however, outlet stores are very nearby.

title: Gorgeous Scenery
text: Even in the winter months, Lake George is a beautiful place to visit. The scenery on the lake is gorgeous.

title: A Great Hotel and Convention Center
text: Beautiful hotel, rooms immaculate , stunning lobby. Very close to Disneyland. Great convention center.
